description:
How do you make sure your email campaign makes sales - and keeps your subscribers engaged so they'll purchase again and again? Including the psychological triggers that build relationships in real life creates a strong relationship with your list and earns you repeat sales.

Video lessons cover each of the seven triggers, plus give you practical strategies for including each one in your email campaigns. You'll know which to use first, and how to grow others over time (this is essential if you want to avoid actually driving your subscribers away).

I also share proven strategies for building your authority and give tips for driving more traffic to your squeeze pages (plus how you can avoid having "one of those" squeeze pages that actually turns off your buyers and gets you nothing but freebie-seekers).

Written lessons give you copy-and-paste email templates that use the triggers so you can build a great relationship - and a buying relationship - right from the start.
title: How to Use Powerful Triggers and Content for Email Campaigns
